name: SearchResult

methods.name: getSObject
methods.description: Returns an sObject from a SearchResult object.

methods.name: getSnippet
methods.description: Returns a snippet from a Case, Feed, or Knowledge Article SearchResult object based on the specified field name.

params.name: fieldName
params.description: The field name to use for creating the snippet. Valid values: Case.Casenumber, FeedPost.Title, KnowledgeArticleVersion.Title

methods.name: getSnippet
methods.description: Returns a snippet from a SearchResult object based on the default field.

description: A wrapper object that contains an sObject and search metadata.
